patthana13.8:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:1.1_1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:1.1_2: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:1.1_3: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:1.1_4: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:2.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana13.8:3.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.8:4.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.8:5.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.8:6.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa.
